mapper.update: CREATE TABLE h_users ( id NUMBER (20) AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, app varchar2 (255) NOT NULL, username VARCHAR2 (255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password VARCHAR2 (255) NOT NULL, role_id NUMBER (10), created_at NUMBER (20), updated_at NUMBER (20), CONSTRAINT unique_user_app_user UNIQUE (app, username) )

CREATE TABLE h_roles ( id NUMBER (20) AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, app varchar2 (255) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR2 (255) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR2 (500), created_at NUMBER (20), updated_at NUMBER (20), CONSTRAINT unique_role_app_name UNIQUE (app, name) )

CREATE TABLE h_menus ( id NUMBER (20) AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, app varchar2 (255) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR2 (255) NOT NULL, url VARCHAR2 (255), parent_id NUMBER (10) DEFAULT 0, menu_level NUMBER (2) DEFAULT 1, order_index NUMBER (10) DEFAULT 0, icon_name varchar2 (255) DEFAULT 'LogIcon', created_at NUMBER (20), updated_at NUMBER (20), CONSTRAINT unique_menu_app_url UNIQUE (app, url) )
CREATE TABLE h_role_menus ( app varchar2 (255) NOT NULL, role_id NUMBER (20) NOT NULL, menu_id NUMBER (20) NOT NULL, primary key (app, role_id, menu_id) )
